original_text:
I will prepare destroyers against you,
    each with his weapons,
and they shall cut down your choicest cedars
    and cast them into the fire.
korean_text: 내가 너를 파멸할 자를 준비하리니 그들이 각기 손에 무기를 가지고 네 아름다운 백향목을 찍어 불에 던지리라

sentences.original_text: I will prepare destroyers against you
and they shall cut down your choicest cedars
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그들이 너의 최상의 백향목들을 베어내고

sentences.original_text: and cast them into the fire.
